description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pelleteuse is a arcade game. Your task is to collect Emeralds, try to stay alive from falling bags and avoid monsters. You are placed in an underground maze, and can dig horizontal and vertical tunnels through it.
description.short: Pelleteuse is a arcade game. Your task is to collect Emeralds, try to stay alive from falling bags and avoid monsters. You are placed in an underground maze, and can dig horizontal and vertical tunnels through it.
